about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: This content requires the base game Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy and the previous DLC Commonwealth Forces and Market Garden and Vehicle Pack on Steam in order to play.


Battle Pack 2 is the latest DLC addition for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy.

It focuses on the operations of the 4th Infantry Division on D-Day and the 101st Airborne Division up to June 13, 1944. This period marks the capture of Carentan and the connection between the American landing beaches.

Battlepack Contents

  • 3 gripping Campaigns (21 variant scenarios)
  • 8 standalone Scenarios
  • 6 Master Maps (63.7 km squared)

Campaign Highlights

  • Multiple Perspectives: Command Allied forces in daring night drops with the 1/506 PIR and beach landings with the 2/8 IR of the 4th Infantry Division, or lead German forces in a desperate bid to reclaim Carentan.
  • Intense Combat: Engage in intense combat across eight scenarios, testing your tactical prowess against friends or AI opponents.
  • Expansive Battlegrounds: Explore vast battlegrounds with six meticulously crafted maps spanning historical locations, featuring fortifications and destruction variants.
  • Rewrite History: With its diverse array of campaigns, scenarios, and maps, Battle Pack 2 DLC offers endless hours of immersive gameplay, allowing you to rewrite the pages of history with every decisive move.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.8 Ghz or equivalent speed AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM or better and must support 1024x768 or higher resolution in OpenGL ***IMPORTANT*** Not all Intel integrated video cards will play the game.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible Sound Card (Windows only)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent speed AMD processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM or better and must support 1024x768 or higher resolution in OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 compatible Sound Card (Windows only)
